SCTX - Script Source:
ScriptName fbmwtulscript

Begin OnDeath

	if GetStage fbmwMVFakeSlave < 59		; died on the trip before reaching destination
		SetStage fbmwMVFakeSlave 90			; quest ends prematurely without reward.

	elseif GetStage fbmwMVFakeSlave >= 59	; reached destination
		if fbmwsterdecanref.GetDead
			SetStage fbmwMVFakeSlave 85			; we killed Tul, no reward giver alive though
		else
			SetStage fbmwMVFakeSlave 80			; we killed Tul
			fbmwsterdecanref.StopCombat
		endif

	endif

End

Begin OnPackageDone fbmwtulfollow

	SetStage fbmwMVFakeSlave 59
	mwTulREF.StartConversation Player GREETING

End

;
Begin GameMode

	if GetQuestRunning fbmwMVFakeSlave == 0
		return
	endif

	IF PlayerRef.GetDistance fbmwsterdecanref < 512 && GetStage fbmwMVFakeSlave < 59
		SetStage fbmwMVFakeSlave 59
		mwTulREF.StartConversation Player GREETING
		set fbmwMVFakeSlave.follownow to 0
	endif

END

;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 823 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
